00047 /* This value inidcates whether we are processing an Infiniband packet, or
00048    TCP.  It gets set to the extra bytes the IB header requires if IB,
00049    or zero if TCP. */
00050 static guint ib_lnd_extra_bytes;
00051 
00052 /* How much data has at least to be available to be able to determine the
00053  * length of the lnet message.
00054  * Note: This is only used for TCP-based LNet packets.  Not used for Infiniband.
00055  */
00056 #define LNET_HEADER_LEN 52
00057 #define LNET_NID_DEST_OFFSET (24 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes)
00058 #define LNET_NID_SRC_OFFSET (32 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes)
00059 #define LNET_MSG_TYPE_OFFSET (48 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes)
00060 #define LNET_PTL_INDEX_OFFSET_PUT (88 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes)
00061 
00062 #define EXTRA_IB_HEADER_SIZE 24
00063 
00064 /* TCP ports used for LNet. */
00065 static guint global_lnet_tcp_port = 988;
00066 static guint lnet_tcp_port = 988;
00067 
00068 void proto_reg_handoff_lnet(void);

00211 /* SOCKLND constants. */
00212 #define KSOCK_MSG_NOOP          0xc0            /* ksm_u empty */ 
00213 #define KSOCK_MSG_LNET          0xc1            /* lnet msg */
00214 
00215 static const value_string ksm_type_t[] = {
00216         {0xc0, "KSOCK_MSG_NOOP"},/* ksm_u empty */ 
00217         {0xc1, "KSOCK_MSG_LNET"} /* lnet msg */
00218 };
00219 
00220 /* O2IBLND constants. */
00221 #define LNET_PROTO_IB_MAGIC     0x0be91b91
00222 
00223 static const value_string ib_version_t[] = {
00224         {0x11, "1"},
00225         {0x12, "2"}
00226 };
00227 
00228 #define IBLND_MSG_CONNREQ       0xc0    /* connection request */
00229 #define IBLND_MSG_CONNACK       0xc1    /* connection acknowledge */
00230 #define IBLND_MSG_NOOP          0xd0    /* nothing (just credits) */
00231 #define IBLND_MSG_IMMEDIATE     0xd1    /* immediate */
00232 #define IBLND_MSG_PUT_REQ       0xd2    /* putreq (src->sink) */
00233 #define IBLND_MSG_PUT_NAK       0xd3    /* completion (sink->src) */
00234 #define IBLND_MSG_PUT_ACK       0xd4    /* putack (sink->src) */
00235 #define IBLND_MSG_PUT_DONE      0xd5    /* completion (src->sink) */
00236 #define IBLND_MSG_GET_REQ       0xd6    /* getreq (sink->src) */
00237 #define IBLND_MSG_GET_DONE      0xd7    /* completion (src->sink: all OK) */
00238 
00239 static const value_string ib_type_t[] = {
00240         {0xc0, "IBLND_MSG_CONNREQ"},
00241         {0xc1, "IBLND_MSG_CONNACK"},
00242         {0xd0, "IBLND_MSG_NOOP"},
00243         {0xd1, "IBLND_MSG_IMMEDIATE"},
00244         {0xd2, "IBLND_MSG_PUT_REQ"},
00245         {0xd3, "IBLND_MSG_PUT_NAK"},
00246         {0xd4, "IBLND_MSG_PUT_ACK"},
00247         {0xd5, "IBLND_MSG_PUT_DONE"},
00248         {0xd6, "IBLND_MSG_GET_REQ"},
00249         {0xd7, "IBLND_MSG_GET_DONE"}
00250 };

00276 static t_nid
00277 get_nid(tvbuff_t *tvb, gint offset)
00278 {
00279         t_nid nid ;
00280 
00281         nid.addr = g_htonl(tvb_get_ipv4(tvb, offset));
00282         nid.interface = tvb_get_letohs(tvb, offset + 4);
00283         nid.proto = tvb_get_letohs(tvb, offset + 6);
00284         return nid ;
00285 }
00286 
00287 static int dissect_csum(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00288 {
00289         guint32 csum;
00290         csum = tvb_get_letohl(tvb, offset);
00291         if (!csum)
00292                 proto_tree_add_text(tree, tvb, offset, 4, "Checksum Disabled");
00293         else {
00294                 if (ib_lnd_extra_bytes)
00295                         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_csum, tvb, offset,
00296                                             4, little_endian);
00297                 else
00298                         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ksm_csum, tvb, offset,
00299                                             4, little_endian);
00300         }
00301 
00302         return offset + 4;
00303 }
00304 
00305 
00306 static int dissect_req_cookie(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00307 {
00308         guint32 req;
00309         req= tvb_get_letoh64(tvb, offset);
00310         if (!req)
00311                 proto_tree_add_text(tree, tvb, offset, 8, "Ack not required");
00312         else
00313                 proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ksm_zc_req_cookie, tvb, offset, 8, little_endian);
00314         return offset + 8;
00315 }
00316 
00317 static int dissect_ack_cookie(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00318 {
00319         guint32 ack;
00320         ack= tvb_get_letoh64(tvb, offset);
00321         if (!ack)
00322                 proto_tree_add_text(tree, tvb, offset, 8, "Not ack");
00323         else
00324                 proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ksm_zc_ack_cookie, tvb, offset, 8, little_endian);
00325         return offset + 8;
00326 }
00327 
00328 static void 
00329 dissect_ksock_msg_noop( tvbuff_t * tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree)
00330 {
00331         guint32 offset;
00332         offset=0;
00333         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ksm_type, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE);offset+=4;
00334         offset=dissect_csum(tvb,tree,offset);
00335         offset=dissect_req_cookie(tvb, tree, offset);
00336         offset=dissect_ack_cookie(tvb,tree,offset);
00337 }
00338 
00339 
00340 static int dissect_ksock_msg(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00341 {
00342         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ksm_type, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE);offset+=4;
00343         offset=dissect_csum(tvb,tree,offset);
00344         offset=dissect_req_cookie(tvb, tree, offset);
00345         offset=dissect_ack_cookie(tvb,tree,offset);
00346         return offset;
00347 }
00348 
00349 static int
00350 dissect_ib_msg(tvbuff_t *tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00351 {
00352         /* typedef struct
00353          * {
00354          *      __u32             ibm_magic;            * I'm an ibnal message *
00355          *      __u16             ibm_version;          * this is my version *
00356 
00357          *      __u8              ibm_type;             * msg type *
00358          *      __u8              ibm_credits;          * returned credits *
00359          *      __u32             ibm_nob;              * # bytes in message *
00360          *      __u32             ibm_cksum;            * checksum (0 == no
00361          *                                                checksum) *
00362          *      __u64             ibm_srcnid;           * sender's NID *
00363          *      __u64             ibm_srcstamp;         * sender's incarnation *
00364          *      __u64             ibm_dstnid;           * destination's NID *
00365          *      __u64             ibm_dststamp;         * destination's
00366          *                                                incarnation *
00367 
00368          *      union {
00369          *              kib_connparams_t      connparams;
00370          *              kib_immediate_msg_t   immediate;
00371          *              kib_putreq_msg_t      putreq;
00372          *              kib_putack_msg_t      putack;
00373          *              kib_get_msg_t         get;
00374          *              kib_completion_msg_t  completion;
00375          *      } WIRE_ATTR ibm_u;
00376          *} WIRE_ATTR kib_msg_t;   */
00377 
00378         t_nid src_nid;
00379         t_nid dst_nid;
00380         guint8 msg_type;
00381 
00382         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_magic, tvb, offset, 4,
00383                             little_endian);
00384         offset += 4;
00385         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_version, tvb, offset, 2,
00386                             little_endian);
00387         offset += 2;
00388         msg_type = tvb_get_guint8(tvb, offset);
00389         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_type, tvb, offset, 1,
00390                             little_endian);
00391         offset += 1;
00392         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_credits, tvb, offset, 1,
00393                             little_endian);
00394         offset += 1;
00395         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_nob, tvb, offset, 4,
00396                             little_endian);
00397         offset += 4;
00398         offset = dissect_csum(tvb, tree, offset);
00399 
00400         src_nid = get_nid(tvb, offset);
00401         proto_tree_add_text(tree, tvb, offset, 8, "src_nid = %s@tcp%d",
00402                             ip_to_str((guint8 *) &src_nid.addr),
00403                             src_nid.interface);
00404         offset += 8;
00405         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_srcstamp, tvb, offset, 8,
00406                             little_endian);
00407         offset += 8;
00408 
00409         dst_nid = get_nid(tvb, offset);
00410         proto_tree_add_text(tree, tvb, offset, 8, "dst_nid = %s@tcp%d",
00411                             ip_to_str((guint8 *) &dst_nid.addr),
00412                             dst_nid.interface);
00413         offset += 8;
00414         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_ib_dststamp, tvb,offset, 8,
00415                             little_endian);
00416         offset += 8;
00417 
00418         /* LNet payloads only exist when the LND msg type is IMMEDIATE.
00419            Return a zero offset for all other types. */
00420         return (msg_type == IBLND_MSG_IMMEDIATE) ? offset : 0;
00421 }
00422 
00423 static int dissect_dest_nid(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00424 {
00425         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_dest_nid_addr, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE);offset+=4;
00426         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_dest_nid_interface, tvb, offset, 2, TRUE);offset+=2;
00427         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_dest_nid_lnet_type, tvb, offset, 2, TRUE);offset+=2;
00428         return offset;
00429 }
00430 
00431 
00432 static int dissect_src_nid(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00433 {
00434         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_src_nid_addr, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE);offset+=4;
00435         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_src_nid_interface, tvb, offset, 2, TRUE);offset+=2;
00436         proto_tree_add_item(tree, hf_lnet_src_nid_lnet_type, tvb, offset, 2, TRUE);offset+=2;
00437         return offset;
00438 }
00439 
00440 static int dissect_lnet_put(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset, packet_info *pinfo _U_)
00441 {
00442         /* typedef struct lnet_put {
00443                  lnet_handle_wire_t  ack_wmd;
00444                  __u64               match_bits;
00445                  __u64               hdr_data;
00446                  __u32               ptl_index;
00447                  __u32               offset;
00448                  } WIRE_ATTR lnet_put_t; */
00449 
00450         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_interface,tvb,offset,8,little_endian); offset+=8;
00451         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_object,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00452 
00453         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_match_bits,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00454         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_hdr_data,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00455         if (check_col(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO)) 
00456                 col_append_sep_str(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO, ", ",
00457                 val_to_str(tvb_get_letohl(tvb, offset), portal_indices,
00458                            "Unknown")); /* add some nice value  */
00459         proto_item_append_text(tree, ", %s" , val_to_str(tvb_get_letohl(tvb,
00460                                                                         offset),
00461                                                          portal_indices,
00462                                                          "Unknown"));
00463                                                          /* print ptl_index */
00464         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_ptl_index,tvb,offset,4,little_endian);offset+=4;
00465         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_offset,tvb,offset,4,little_endian);offset+=4;
00466         return offset ; 
00467 }
00468 
00469 static int dissect_lnet_get(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset, packet_info *pinfo _U_)
00470 {
00471         /* typedef struct lnet_get {
00472                  lnet_handle_wire_t  return_wmd;
00473                  __u64               match_bits;
00474                  __u32               ptl_index;
00475                  __u32               src_offset;
00476                  __u32               sink_length;
00477                  } WIRE_ATTR lnet_get_t; */
00478 
00479         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_interface,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00480         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_object,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00481         /*if (check_col(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO))*/
00482         /*        col_prepend_fence_fstr(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO, " %" G_GINT64_MODIFIER "u ", tvb_get_letoh64(tvb,offset) );*/
00483 
00484         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_match_bits,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00485         if (check_col(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO)) 
00486                 col_append_sep_str(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO, ", ", val_to_str(tvb_get_letohl(tvb,offset), portal_indices, "Unknown"));
00487         proto_item_append_text(tree, ", %s" , val_to_str(tvb_get_letohl(tvb,offset), portal_indices, "Unknown"));
00488         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_ptl_index,tvb,offset,4,little_endian);offset+=4;
00489         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_src_offset,tvb,offset,4,little_endian);offset+=4;
00490         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_sink_length,tvb,offset,4,little_endian);offset+=4;
00491         return offset; 
00492 }
00493 
00494 static int dissect_lnet_reply(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00495 {
00496         /* typedef struct lnet_reply {
00497                  lnet_handle_wire_t  dst_wmd;
00498                  } WIRE_ATTR lnet_reply_t; */
00499 
00500         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_interface,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8; 
00501         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_object,tvb,offset,8,little_endian);offset+=8;
00502 
00503         return offset;
00504 }
00505 
00506 
00507 static int dissect_lnet_hello(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset)
00508 {
00509         /* typedef struct lnet_hello {
00510                  __u64              incarnation;
00511                  __u32              type;
00512                  } WIRE_ATTR lnet_hello_t; */
00513 
00514         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_hello_incarnation,tvb,offset,8,little_endian); offset+=8;
00515         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_hello_type,tvb,offset,4,little_endian); offset+=4;
00516         return offset; 
00517 }
00518 
00519 static int dissect_lnet_ack(tvbuff_t * tvb, proto_tree *tree, int offset, packet_info *pinfo _U_)
00520 {
00521         /* typedef struct lnet_ack {
00522                  lnet_handle_wire_t  dst_wmd;
00523                  __u64               match_bits;
00524                  __u32               mlength;
00525                  } WIRE_ATTR lnet_ack_t; */
00526 
00527         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_interface,tvb,offset,8,TRUE); offset+=8;
00528         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_dst_wmd_object,tvb,offset,8,TRUE);offset+=8;
00529         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_match_bits,tvb,offset,8, little_endian);offset+=8;
00530         proto_tree_add_item(tree,hf_mlength, tvb,offset,4, little_endian); offset+=4;
00531         return offset ; 
00532 } 
00533 
00534 static void dissect_lnet_message(tvbuff_t * tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree); 
00535 
00536 /* The next two length getting routines are only used for KSOCK LNK messages. */
00537 static guint 
00538 get_lnet_message_len(packet_info  __attribute__((__unused__))*pinfo, tvbuff_t *tvb, int offset) 
00539 { 
00540         guint32 plen;
00541 
00542         /* Get the payload length */
00543         plen = tvb_get_letohl(tvb, offset + 28 + 24 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes);
00544                                                   /* 24 = ksm header,
00545                                                      28 = the rest of the
00546                                                           headers */
00547 
00548         /* That length doesn't include the header; add that in. */
00549         return plen + 72 + 24 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes; /*  +24 == ksock msg
00550                                                         header.. :D */
00551 
00552 }
00553 
00554 static guint
00555 get_noop_message_len(packet_info  __attribute__((__unused__))*pinfo, tvbuff_t *tvb, int offset)
00556 {
00557         return 24;
00558 }
00559 
00560 static void 
00561 dissect_lnet(tvbuff_t *tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree)  
00562 {
00563         /* TODO : correct this, now we do a difference between packet with
00564            NOOP and others ..  but I don't find how to use pdu_dissect with
00565            a variable length<=LNET_HEADER_LEN */
00566         ib_lnd_extra_bytes = 0;
00567         switch(tvb_get_letohl(tvb,0)){
00568                 case KSOCK_MSG_NOOP:
00569                         tcp_dissect_pdus(tvb,pinfo,tree,TRUE,0, get_noop_message_len,dissect_ksock_msg_noop);
00570                         break;
00571                 case KSOCK_MSG_LNET:
00572                         tcp_dissect_pdus(tvb,pinfo,tree,TRUE,LNET_HEADER_LEN, get_lnet_message_len,dissect_lnet_message);
00573                         break;
00574         }
00575 
00576 }
00577 
00578 static int
00579 dissect_ib_lnet(tvbuff_t *tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree, void*data)
00580 {
00581         /* We can tell if this is an LNet payload by looking at the first
00582          * 32-bit word for our magic number. */
00583         if (tvb_get_letohl(tvb, 0) != LNET_PROTO_IB_MAGIC) {
00584                 /* Not an LNet payload. */
00585                 return 0;
00586         }
00587 
00588         ib_lnd_extra_bytes = EXTRA_IB_HEADER_SIZE;
00589         tcp_dissect_pdus(tvb, pinfo, tree, TRUE, LNET_HEADER_LEN,
00590                          get_lnet_message_len, dissect_lnet_message);
00591         return tvb_length(tvb);
00592 }
00593 
00594 /*----------------------------------------------------------- */
00595 /* For the conversation */
00596 
00597 typedef struct {
00598         guint64 match_bits;
00599 } my_entry_t;
00600 
00601 
00602 typedef struct lnet_request_key {
00603         guint64 match_bits ;
00604         guint32 conversation;
00605 } lnet_request_key_t;
00606 
00607 typedef struct lnet_request_val {
00608         guint64 match_bits;
00609         guint32 packet_num_parent;
00610 } lnet_request_val_t;
00611 
00612 
00613 static GHashTable *lnet_request_hash;
00614 
00615 /*
00616  * Hash Functions
00617  */
00618 static gint
00619 lnet_equal(gconstpointer v, gconstpointer w)
00620 {
00621         const struct lnet_request_key *v1 = (const struct lnet_request_key *)v;
00622         const struct lnet_request_key *v2 = (const struct lnet_request_key *)w;
00623 
00624         if (v1 -> conversation == v2 -> conversation &&
00625                         v1 -> match_bits == v2 -> match_bits)
00626         {
00627 
00628                 return 1;
00629         }
00630 
00631         return 0;
00632 }
00633 
00634 static guint
00635 lnet_hash (gconstpointer v)
00636 {
00637         const struct lnet_request_key *key = (const struct lnet_request_key *)v;
00638         return key -> conversation + key -> match_bits;
00639 }
00640 
00641 
00642 static void
00643 lnet_init_protocol(void)
00644 {
00645         if (lnet_request_hash)
00646                 g_hash_table_destroy(lnet_request_hash);
00647 
00648         lnet_request_hash = g_hash_table_new(lnet_hash, lnet_equal);
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00652 static lnet_request_val_t*
00653 get_lnet_conv(packet_info * pinfo , GHashTable * lnet_hash_table,  guint64 match_bits )
00654 {
00655         conversation_t *  conversation ; 
00656         lnet_request_key_t request_key, *new_request_key;
00657         lnet_request_val_t *request_val=NULL ;
00658 
00659         conversation = find_conversation(pinfo->fd->num, &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst, pinfo->ptype, pinfo->srcport, pinfo->destport, 0);
00660 
00661 
00662         if (NULL == conversation)
00663                 /* It's not part of any conversation - create a new one. */
00664                 conversation = conversation_new(pinfo->fd->num,  &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst, proto_lnet,
00665                                 pinfo->srcport, pinfo->destport, 0);
00666 
00667         request_key.conversation = conversation->index;
00668         request_key.match_bits = match_bits;
00669 
00670         request_val = (struct lnet_request_val * ) g_hash_table_lookup(lnet_hash_table, &request_key);
00671         if(!request_val){
00672                 new_request_key = se_alloc(sizeof(struct lnet_request_key));
00673                 *new_request_key = request_key;
00674                 request_val = se_alloc(sizeof(struct lnet_request_val));
00675                 request_val -> match_bits = match_bits;
00676                 request_val -> packet_num_parent = pinfo->fd->num ;
00677                 /*request_val -> filename = "test" ; */
00678                 g_hash_table_insert(lnet_hash_table, new_request_key, request_val);
00679 
00680         }
00681 
00682         return request_val ;
00683 
00684 }
00685 
00686 
00687 
00688 /*----------------------------------------------------------- */
00689 static void
00690 dissect_lnet_message(tvbuff_t * tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree)
00691 {
00692 
00693         guint64 match;
00694         guint32 msg_type;
00695 /*
00696         lnet_request_val_t* conversation_val ;
00697 
00698 */
00699         if (check_col(pinfo->cinfo, COL_PROTOCOL)) {
00700                 col_set_str(pinfo->cinfo, COL_PROTOCOL, "Lnet");
00701         }
00702 
00703         if (check_col(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO)) {
00704                 /* t_nid dest_nid ; */
00705                 /*t_nid src_nid ; */
00706                 /*guint32 msg_type;*/
00707                 /*[> col_clear(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO); <]*/
00708                 /*dest_nid = get_nid(tvb, LNET_NID_DEST_OFFSET);*/
00709                 /*src_nid = get_nid(tvb, LNET_NID_SRC_OFFSET);*/
00710 
00711                 /*[> col_add_fstr(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO, "%s@tcp%d > %s@tcp%d",
00712                         ip_to_str((guint8 *) &src_nid.addr), src_nid.interface,
00713                         ip_to_str((guint8 *) & dest_nid.addr), dest_nid.interface); */
00714 
00715                 msg_type = tvb_get_letohl(tvb, LNET_MSG_TYPE_OFFSET );
00716                 /* We delete the entire line and add LNET  + msg_type */
00717                 col_add_fstr(pinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO, "LNET_%s", (msg_type < sizeof(lnet_msg_type_t)/sizeof(value_string)) ? lnet_msg_type_t[msg_type].strptr : "Unknown");
00718         }
00719 
00720         if (tree) {
00721                 t_nid dest_nid ; /* nid value */
00722                 t_nid src_nid ; 
00723 
00724 
00725                 proto_item *ti = NULL; /* principal  node */
00726                 proto_tree *lnet_tree = NULL ; /* principal tree */
00727                 proto_tree *lnet_nid_src_tree= NULL ; /*subtree for the nids*/
00728                 proto_tree *lnet_nid_dest_tree= NULL ; 
00729                 proto_item *ti_src_nid ; /* node for the nids */
00730                 proto_item *ti_dest_nid ; 
00731 
00732                 gint offset = 0 ; 
00733 
00734                 guint32 msg_type ;
00735                 guint32 payload_length; 
00736                 guint32 msg_filler_length;
00737 
00738 
00739                 ti = proto_tree_add_item(tree,proto_lnet,tvb,0,-1,FALSE); /* principal node */ 
00740                 /*      ti=proto_tree_add_protocol_format(tree, proto_lnet, tvb, 0, -1, "Lnet"); */
00741 
00742                 lnet_tree = proto_item_add_subtree(ti,ett_lnet); /* add the subtree*/
00743 
00744                 if (ib_lnd_extra_bytes) {
00745                         offset = dissect_ib_msg(tvb, lnet_tree, offset);
00746                         if (offset == 0) {
00747                                 /*  There was no LNet payload, only ob2lnd. */
00748                                 return;
00749                         }
00750                 } else {
00751                         /* dissect the first 24 bytes (ksock_msg_t in
00752                            lnet/socklnd.h */
00753                         offset=dissect_ksock_msg(tvb,lnet_tree,offset);
00754                 }
00755 
00756                 /* Dest nid */
00757                 dest_nid = get_nid(tvb, offset);
00758                 ti_dest_nid = proto_tree_add_text(lnet_tree, tvb, offset, 8, "dest_nid = %s@tcp%d", ip_to_str((guint8 *) &dest_nid.addr), dest_nid.interface);
00759                 lnet_nid_dest_tree = proto_item_add_subtree(ti_dest_nid,ett_lnet_dest_nid) ; 
00760                 offset=dissect_dest_nid(tvb,lnet_nid_dest_tree,offset); 
00761 
00762                 /* Same for src_nid */
00763                 src_nid = get_nid(tvb, offset);
00764                 ti_src_nid = proto_tree_add_text(lnet_tree, tvb, offset, 8, "src_nid = %s@tcp%d", ip_to_str((guint8 *) &src_nid.addr), src_nid.interface);
00765                 lnet_nid_src_tree = proto_item_add_subtree(ti_src_nid,ett_lnet_src_nid) ; 
00766                 offset=dissect_src_nid(tvb,lnet_nid_src_tree,offset);
00767 
00768                 /* pid */
00769                 proto_tree_add_item(lnet_tree, hf_lnet_src_pid, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE); offset+=4;
00770                 proto_tree_add_item(lnet_tree, hf_lnet_dest_pid, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE); offset+=4;
00771 
00772                 /* message_type (32 bits) */
00773                 msg_type = tvb_get_letohl(tvb, offset+0);
00774                 /* put some nice info on lnet line */ 
00775                 proto_item_append_text(ti," %s", (msg_type < sizeof(lnet_msg_type_t)/sizeof(value_string)) ? lnet_msg_type_t[msg_type].strptr : "Unknow") ;  /* rajout de l'info dans l'arbre */
00776                 proto_tree_add_item(lnet_tree, hf_lnet_msg_type, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE); offset+=4;
00777 
00778                 /* payload data (to follow) length :*/
00779                 payload_length = tvb_get_letohl(tvb,offset+0);  
00780                 proto_tree_add_item(lnet_tree, hf_lnet_payload_length, tvb, offset, 4, TRUE); offset+=4;
00781 
00782                 /* here offset = 24+8+8+4+4+4+4 = 56 */
00783                 match = 0 ;
00784                 switch(msg_type) {
00785                         case LNET_MSG_ACK:
00786                                 offset=dissect_lnet_ack(tvb,lnet_tree,offset,pinfo);
00787                                 match = tvb_get_letoh64(tvb,72 );
00788                                 break;
00789                         case LNET_MSG_PUT:
00790                                 offset=dissect_lnet_put(tvb,lnet_tree,offset,pinfo);
00791                                 match = tvb_get_letoh64(tvb, 72);
00792                                 break;
00793                         case LNET_MSG_GET:
00794                                 offset=dissect_lnet_get(tvb,lnet_tree,offset,pinfo);
00795                                 match = tvb_get_letoh64(tvb, 72);
00796                                 break;
00797                         case LNET_MSG_REPLY:
00798                                 offset=dissect_lnet_reply(tvb,lnet_tree,offset);
00799                                 break;
00800                         case LNET_MSG_HELLO:
00801                                 offset=dissect_lnet_hello(tvb,lnet_tree,offset);
00802                                 break;
00803                         default:
00804                                 break;
00805                 }
00806 
00807 
00808                 /* conversation_val = */
00809                 get_lnet_conv(pinfo , lnet_request_hash, match );
00810                 /*      proto_tree_add_text(tree, tvb, 0 , 0, "match = %"
00811                         G_GINT64_MODIFIER "u parent = %d",
00812                         conversation_val -> match_bits ,
00813                         conversation_val -> packet_num_parent); */
00814 
00815 
00816                 /* padding */
00817                 msg_filler_length = 72 - offset + 24 + ib_lnd_extra_bytes;
00818                 if ( msg_filler_length > 72)
00819                         return ;
00820                 /*  +24 : ksosck_message take 24bytes, and allready in offset  */
00821 
00822                 proto_tree_add_item(lnet_tree, hf_lnet_msg_filler, tvb, offset,
00823                                     msg_filler_length, little_endian);
00824                 offset+=msg_filler_length;
00825 
00826                 if (payload_length>0)
00827                 {
00828 
00829                         /* display of payload */ 
00830                         proto_tree_add_item(lnet_tree, hf_lnet_payload, tvb,
00831                                             offset, payload_length,
00832                                             little_endian);
00833 
00834                         next_tvb = tvb_new_subset (tvb, offset, payload_length, payload_length);
00835                         if(msg_type==LNET_MSG_PUT)
00836                                 dissector_try_uint(subdissector_table, tvb_get_letohl(tvb,LNET_PTL_INDEX_OFFSET_PUT), next_tvb, pinfo, tree);
00837 
00838                 }
00839 
00840                 offset+=payload_length;
00841         } 
00842 }
00843

00845 proto_register_lnet(void)
00846 {
00847         static hf_register_info hf[] = {
00848                 { &hf_lnet_ksm_type           , 
00849                         { "Type of socklnd message"   , "lnet.ksm_type"                , FT_UINT32 , BASE_HEX     , VALS(ksm_type_t)      , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL }} ,

00851                         { "Checksum"                  , "lnet.ksm_csum"                , FT_UINT32 , BASE_DEC     , NULL                  , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL }} , 
00852                 { &hf_lnet_ksm_zc_req_cookie  , 
00853                         { "Ack required"              , "lnet.ksm_zc_req_cookie"       , FT_UINT64 , BASE_HEX     , NULL                  , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL }} ,

00855                         { "Ack"                       , "lnet.ksm_zc_ack_cookie"       , FT_UINT64 , BASE_HEX     , NULL                  , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL }} ,

00858                           BASE_HEX, NULL, 0x0, "", HFILL} },
00859                 { &hf_lnet_ib_version,

00943                 { &hf_hello_type              , 
00944                         { "hello type"                , "lnet.hello_type"              , FT_UINT32 , BASE_DEC     , NULL                  , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL}}  , 
00945 
00946                 { &hf_lnet_msg_header         , 
00947                         { "ptl header"                , "lnet.ptl_header"              , FT_NONE   , BASE_NONE    , NULL                  , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL}}  , 
00948 
00949                 { &hf_lnet_msg_filler         , 
00950                         { "msg filler (padding)"      , "lnet.ptl_filler"              , FT_NONE   , BASE_NONE    , NULL                  , 0x0 , ""         , HFILL}}  , 
00951 
00952                 /* Add more fields here */
00953         };
00954 
00955         static gint *ett[] = {
00956                 &ett_lnet,
00957                 &ett_lnet_dest_nid,
00958                 &ett_lnet_src_nid
00959         };
00960 
00961 
00962         module_t *lnet_module;
00963 
00964         proto_lnet = proto_register_protocol("Lnet", /*name*/
00965                         "Lnet",  /*short name*/
00966                         "lnet"); /*abbrev*/
00967 
00968         proto_register_field_array(proto_lnet, hf, array_length(hf));
00969         proto_register_subtree_array(ett, array_length(ett));
00970 
00971         lnet_module = prefs_register_protocol(proto_lnet, proto_reg_handoff_lnet);
00972 
00973         prefs_register_uint_preference(lnet_module, "tcp.lnet_port",
00974                         "Lnet listener TCP Port",
00975                         "Set the TCP port for Lnet"
00976                         "(if other than the default of 988)",
00977                         10, &global_lnet_tcp_port);
00978 
00979         subdissector_table = register_dissector_table("lnet.ptl_index", "lnet portal index", FT_UINT32 , BASE_DEC);
00980 
00981         register_init_routine(&lnet_init_protocol);
00982 
00983 }
00984 
00985 
00986 /* The registration hand-off routine */
00987 void
00988 proto_reg_handoff_lnet(void)
00989 {
00990         static int lnet_prefs_initialized = FALSE;
00991         static dissector_handle_t lnet_handle;
00992 
00993         if(!lnet_prefs_initialized) {
00994                 heur_dissector_add("infiniband.payload", dissect_ib_lnet,
00995                                    proto_lnet);
00996                 heur_dissector_add("infiniband.mad.cm.private",
00997                                    dissect_ib_lnet, proto_lnet);
00998                 lnet_handle = create_dissector_handle(dissect_lnet, proto_lnet);
00999                 lnet_prefs_initialized = TRUE;
01000         }
01001         else
01002                 dissector_delete_uint("tcp.port", global_lnet_tcp_port, lnet_handle);
01003 
01004         lnet_tcp_port = global_lnet_tcp_port;
01005 
01006         dissector_add_uint("tcp.port", lnet_tcp_port, lnet_handle);
01007 }
